Attention

(August 2021) Streetmix documentation has now moved! Please update your bookmarks to https://docs.streetmix.net/.

Welcome!¶

Hi there, and welcome to Streetmix documentation! This documentation contains contributor guidelines for code, illustrations, translations, data, and more. It also contains helpful tips and reference information for street planning and civic engagement.

Attention

This is a work in progress as we migrate miscellaneous documents into this space. If you’d like to pitch in, check out our guidelines for contributing to documentation (Documentation)!
